abstract: Philadelphia Flyers defeat Washington Capitals, 2-1; other pro hockey news noted.

headline.main: Philadelphia Flyers Win Over Washington Capitals in Shootout

snippet: Nick Cousins and Sam Gagner scored in a shootout to lift the host Philadelphia Flyers to a 2-1 victory over the Washington Capitals.
lead_paragraph: Nick Cousins and Sam Gagner scored in a shootout to lift the host Philadelphia Flyers to a 2-1 victory over the Washington Capitals.
